  • Constructor Details

    • GuiAddUpdate

      public GuiAddUpdate(GuiFrame guiFrame, int windowWidth, int sButtonEdge, int rButtonWidth, ActionListener listener, ContactDatabase database)
      Constructs a mode for the GUI that is used in adding and updating contact information.
      Parameters:
      guiFrame - The GUI that this mode is used in.
      windowWidth - Width of the GUI window.
      sButtonEdge - Length of an edge of a square button.
      rButtonWidth - Width of a rectangle button.
      listener - ActionListener that handles button presses (GUI).
      database - The contacts database used by the GUI.

    • checkInput

      private boolean checkInput()
      Checks if the text fields contain valid inputs.
      Returns:
      true if all inputs are valid false otherwise

    • setLabelColor

      private void setLabelColor(boolean isValid, JLabel label)
      Sets label's text color to red if invalid input was given. If input was valid the color is set to black.
      Parameters:
      isValid - Boolean to check if input was valid.
      label - The label whose color will be set.
